title: Yatri Sathi - Cab Booking App
description:
Mast Ride, Sahi Price. Kolkata Moves with Yatri Sathi.

Join over 4 million+ users who’ve taken 10 million+ rides with 1.1 lakh+ trusted drivers.

Yatri Sathi is Kolkata’s very own ride-hailing app — built for the city, by the city.

From early morning airport drops to late-night Park Street pickups, Yatri Sathi gets you there.

✅ Why ride with Yatri Sathi?

💸 Best fares in the city – Mast Ride, Sahi Price

🚖 Cabs in under 2 mins – Quick and reliable bookings

🔁 Low cancellations – Trusted rides, every time

💵 UPI or cash – Flexible payment options

🧍‍♂️ Verified drivers – 1.1 lakh+ professionals onboard

🚨 Feature Highlights

🚌 Track & book buses right from the app

🎟️ Book tickets to Kolkata’s top attractions

🌐 Multi-language app – Bengali, Hindi, English & more

🛡️ SOS button – Instant help, always available

📍 Live trip tracking – Share with friends & family

💬 In-app messaging – Keep loved ones updated

🛠️ Change drop point mid-ride

🚖 Outstation & rentals – Intercity and hourly bookings

📊 Open data – Full transparency: yatrisathi.in/open

📦 Send parcels – Delivery made easy

📲 Download Yatri Sathi now
Book your ride in 3 easy steps:
Install, Set Location, Ride.

🔗 Stay Connected:
Instagram – @yatri.sathi
Twitter – @yatri_sathi
YouTube – @YatriSathiKol

Learn more: yatrisathi.in/open

summary: Reliable, Affordable, and Safe Cabs in Kolkata

developer.devId: Dept of IT&E, Govt of WB

developerLegalAddress: 6Th Floor, Module C And D, Block Ep And Gp, Moni Bhandar, Street Number 19, Webel Bhavan, Salt Lake Sector-V, Bidhan, Kolkata, West Bengal 700091, India
recentChanges:
🚀 We’ve redesigned the app to make booking rides faster, easier, and more enjoyable!

✨ Clean, modern interface

⚡ Smoother animations & quicker load times

📍 Easier trip tracking and ride management

🔧 Improved overall reliability

Just update the app, book your ride, and feel the difference. 💫
